titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Muslims in Michigan [kit]

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Title from compact disc: Muslims in Michigan : Radio series

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Title from DVD : Muslims in Michigan : community conversation : speaking with young Muslims media presentation

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Radio stories by: Sarah Cwiek, Jennifer Guerra, Sarah Hulett, Dustin Dwyer; Host: Jennifer White ; Photography: Rodrigo Gaya.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Compact disc. Muslims in Michigan (ca. 4 min.) -- A tale of Muslim courtship (ca. 7 min.) -- Convert's story (ca. 4 min.) -- Islamic finance (ca. 4 min.) -- So, a Muslim and Christian move into a dorm room together at Calvin College? (ca. 4 min.) -- A visit to the new Islamic Mosque and Religious Institute (ca. 4 min.) -- DVD. A community conversation (ca. 71 min.) -- Speaking with young Muslims (ca. 2 min.)

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Program notes ([4] p.) inserted in container.

archdesc.scopecontent: "The Muslim in Michigan project was formed out a partnership between Michigan Radio and the University of Michigan Center for Middle Eastern and North African Studies. The six-part radio series examines life for Muslim people living in Michigan. Beyond religion, the series explores the cultural, political, ethnic, and social lives of this diverse group. The project also features film events, speakers, and a community conversation. This media package is intended to be used as an educational resource and community engagement tool."--Container.

corpname.subordinate_name: Center for Middle Eastern and North African Studies
